name: espn-epl
description: Get Premier League scores, standings, and team schedules from ESPN.
voice_triggers: What are the Premier League scores?
Where is Arsenal in the table?
author: cmac86

name: espn-f1
description: Get Formula 1 race results, schedule, and driver standings from ESPN.
voice_triggers: Who won the last F1 race?
author: cmac86

name: espn-mls
description: Get MLS scores, schedules, and standings with optional team and conference filtering.
voice_triggers: When do the Sounders play next?
author: cmac86

name: google-tasks
description: Manage Google Tasks - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with optional due dates and notes.
author: cmac86

name: notion-tasks
description: Manage tasks in Notion - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with support for due dates and filtering.
voice_triggers: What's on my Notion task list?
Add task buy groceries due Friday
author: cmac86
